item.title: How to install tensorflow-gpu without shitting on your computer ?
item.description: Once upon a time There was a operating system called Ubuntu 14.04, I tried installing tensorflow gpu on that. And I was stuck in login loop as Tom cruise was stuck in time loop in the movie “The Edge of tomorrow”. I couldn’t get out of login loop until I installed Ubuntu 16.04 Want to know how was my experience with ubuntu 16.04 In a very few[sarcastic laugh] steps I was able to install it.
